title: Shudh - The Vegetarian Food Court
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Indo-Chinese
description: Vegetarian food court in touristy Karol Bagh area of New Delhi, nearby Jessa Ram Hospital. Casual decor with different sections. A desi kona section offers an assortment of Indian subzi, dal, and bread. A super tambi (South Indian) section sells different kinds of dosas, vada, idly, and other South Indian food. A hearth stone area offers burgers, pizza, sandwiches, and pasta.
